member.name: T:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.MoreThan16Parameters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CannotHandle more than 16 parameters on Action Method: ({0}).

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.NonReplaceableCollection
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property with name ({0}) has an unknown collection type ({1}). Skipping..

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.NoParameterLessConstructorForEqualityComparer
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EqualityComparer ({0}) on Property with name ({1}) on class ({2}) .

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.NoSetterForObservable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property with name ({0}) on class ({1}) has no setter. Did you mean to create a computed property? Use [Computed] instead..

member.name: P:Cortex.Net.Fody.Properties.Resources.PropertyNotAutogenerated
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Property with name ({0}) on class ({1}) is not an auto property generated by the compiler. It's not possible to add the ObservableAttribute. Try manually creating an observable property or use an Atom instead..
